txt.en: This bedding looks like it's been here forever, probably from the previous tenant in this stall. It's awfully dirty and should certainly be replaced at once. Collect some freshly-cut hay stacks to replace this bedding.
The Stable-helper wants you to help the newly-arrived horse to settle into his new stall at the Combe stables.
The hay-piles can be found around the stables and up the road towards Bree-town and Staddle.
The horse-bedding can be found inside the horse's stall.
